programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: We Help One of Our Viewers Get Their Automotive Project Back on Track We help one of our viewers get their automotive project back on track, on today’s Driveway Rescue.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: Big Body Grand Marquis Build Complete build of our Big Body Grand Marquis

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: Return of the Scavenged Small Block Previously, our forgotten Ford powerplant pumped out stout numbers in the dyno cell. Our goal this time: even more power!

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: Buick Regal Paint and Trim Tommy and Marc give us some tips on painting trim and glass installation before our '85 Buick gets a new interior. Plus a Chevelle owner in need of a little rescuing.

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: Supercharged Jeep Wrangler Makes Impress Power Gains on the Dyno The tuner aftermarket for Jeeps is thriving! A supercharged JK makes some impressive power gains on the dyno, thanks to HP Tuners.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: Sea Foam Camaro Payoff With the SeaFoam Camaro finished up, it is time to see what all those upgrades have done for our Restomod Giveaway. Then we help a viewer with some repairs on their vehicle on another Driveway Rescue

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: Stroking Some of Our Favorite Engines There’s no replacement for displacement! We stroke some of our favorite engines, looking for all the horsepower we can find.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: Sea Foam Camaro Part 4/Matco Tool Expo Tommy and Marc finish up the last few details on our '69 SeaFoam Camaro. Plus a mechanics fantasy land we head to California for the Matco Tools Expo to see what new products they have coming out.

programme.title: Truck Tech
programme.desc: Lowered '88 K1500 Sierra The start to finish transformation of a stock ’88 K1500 Sierra into a lowered LS-powered all-wheel-drive beast.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: Sea Foam Camaro Part 3 The guys down in Engine Power have finished beefing up our '69 Camaro' s engine with some high-performance parts, now we have to install it and upgrade the drive train so it can hold it's own with today's modern muscle.

programme.title: Truck Tech
programme.desc: Ram SRT-10 vs F150 EcoBoost: Dragstrip Duel The Build-Off culminates on the dragstrip and the final tallies are made. Appearance, dyno, speed, and tug-o-war will determine the winner.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: Crown Vic Auto to Manual Swap Marc and Tommy rip into the automatic transmission tearing it out of our turbo charged Police Interceptor and swapping it for a head jerking manual 5 speed. Then they take to the track in hot pursuit of some quick times.

programme.title: Truck Tech
programme.desc: Duramax Diesel Cooling & Dragstrip Runs After months in the shop the Duramax in our Sierra Denali gets fired after the cooling issues are solved. Then on to the dyno for a custom tune before it hits the dragstrip.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: 80s Mustang Cobra Transformation Part 2 This hissing Cobra gets dialed in with final touches, taking it from concept to coiled and ready to strike! Strap in for Project Sydewinder’s first track day!

programme.title: Truck Tech
programme.desc: Ram SRT-10 vs. F150 EcoBoost Budgets spent and trucks built, the Ford and Ram go head to head to compare baseline numbers with those after all upgrades. Who will win? Austin’s Eco, or LT’s Viper.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: 80s Mustang Cobra Transformation Part 1 From vision to venom an iconic Ford Foxbody Cobra is transformed into a track ready ground pounder! Marc and Tommy wake up this sleepy snake and convert it into a Mustang with plenty of bite! Hello Project Sydewinder!

programme.title: Truck Tech
programme.desc: Duramax Diesel Engine Assembly & Install We take a responsible turn on our Sierra Denali to make big power, yet keep it street legal. Plus a new twist on exhaust cutouts for late model pick ups.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: Sea Foam Camaro Part 2 We take our '69 Camaro and upgrade the suspension, brakes and tires to give it better handling and performance on the street.

programme.title: Truck Tech
programme.desc: Ram SRT-10 and F150 Exterior Extras With power taken care off, improvements in the good-looks department include cowl hood, custom wheels, plus tips on restoring old paint

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: How-To Body Prep and Lay Down Candy Paint The '85 Buick is ready for some fit and finish with body work and candy paint.

programme.title: Truck Tech
programme.desc: Ram SRT-10 and F150 Get Engine Mods Will the EcoBoost’s larger turbos and a high flow exhaust mean bigger improvements over the Viper’s top end mods? Let the build-up begin!

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: ’69 Camaro RS/SS Revival Destination “fun-town,” Marc and Tommy are taking a ’69 Chevy Camaro RS/SS to the next level! With performance, handling, and appearance upgrades, it’s time to revive this ultra-cool muscle car giveaway ride.

programme.title: Truck Tech
programme.desc: How to Build a High Power Diesel Modifying a Duramax to make high power starts with a teardown and some machining before the new performance parts are added. Plus Austin mods up the body for a cool clean look.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: Tips for Custom Brake Lines and Hoses All of the mechanical and electrical systems are getting buttoned up on our '85 Buick Street Regal. That includes tips and techniques for custom hoses and brake lines.

programme.title: Truck Tech
programme.desc: Ram SRT-10 and F150 Lowering Kits Dropping it down for better traction, our SRT-10 Ram and EcoBoost F150 get new lowering kits. Plus, installing Detroit Truetrac limited slips, locks in more grab and go!

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: Beefing Up a Police Cruiser with New Brakes and Suspension Tommy and Marc’s old Crown Vic Interceptor is whistling a new tune with a turbo, upgraded suspension, gears and bigger tires. The only thing left is a hot pursuit to the donut shop that pushes the legal limits!

programme.title: Truck Tech
programme.desc: Ford F150 EcoBost Vs. Dodge Ram SRT-10 Does a ’15 F150 Ford EcoBoost stand a chance against a ’05 Dodge Ram SRT-10? It’s a head-to-head build-off that starts with a track and dyno baseline. Let the tear down begin!

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: Boosting A Crown Vic Police Interceptor Tommy and Marc almost double the horsepower on a 2008 Ford 4.6L Crown Victoria P71 Police Interceptor. The solution for more power is adding a small tailpipe turbo, exhaust and fuel mods. Then the dyno don’t lie! From 200HP to 368HP, this Vic is ready for high pursuit!

programme.title: Truck Tech
programme.desc: Boosted Classic 292 Straight-Six LT and Austin drop in a boosted 292 six cylinder in the '65 C10 Project Low-n-Slo. Plus, a new 5-speed manual transmission, inner cooler, and brightwork help complete this frame off restoration.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: Custom Race Inspired Fuel System for a Buick Regal With a nod to the Grand National we’re giving our Buick Regal more Go Go. Fabricating a race inspired fuel system gets us one step closer to our '85 Buick Regal launch.

programme.title: Truck Tech
programme.desc: Jeep JK Test; 4x4 from Stock to Rock! Our new project Jeep debuts in a junkyard to crush some cars. Then, it’s back in the shop to cut fenders for bigger wheels and tires and a lift install.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: Adding Stop and Go to a C5 Corvette Z06 Adding more Stop and Go to our C5 Corvette Z06 for the track. Taking our Z06 to the Corvette proving grounds, now it can handle the track to strut its stuff!

programme.title: Truck Tech
programme.desc: Duramax Diesel Teardown and Upgrade to 1000 Horsepower We take apart our 6.6L Duramax from our ’11 Denali HD for an upgrade to 1000HP. Plus, we meet a diesel junkie who built a Cummins powered Ford Ranger pocket rocket for the dragstrip.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: C5 Z06 Bolt on Power Is the C5 Corvette Z06 the ultimate bang for your buck track and street car, or is there room for improvement?

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: LS Gets Updated With Sequential EFI Our 5.3L street machine powerplant gets updated with sequential EFI and more.

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: High Mileage Vortec On the Cheap We’re starting with a high-mileage 5.3L Vortec that we got on the cheap. Our goal: make as much horsepower as we can, spending the least money possible.

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: 632 Big Block Chevy For the Carcass Shop We build a 632 big block Chevy to power an unusual hot rod project for the Carcass shop.

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: Small Block Mopar Stroker Mopar fans rejoice! Chrysler’s venerable muscle car powerplant gets a big cubic inch increase and the induction package you’ve been asking for.

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: 1969 Camaro 350 Needs Some Attention The guys from Detroit Muscle hunted down a sweet ’69 Camaro, but the engine needs a little attention. That’s where we come in.

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: Junkyard Ford 390 FE Teardown and Rebuild Mike and Pat stroke a vintage junkyard Ford 390 but an unexpected surprise puts a delay in their progress. Then it’s full steam ahead for finding the limit for this big block stump puller

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: Ford 300 Inline Six From freeway to farmyard, this rugged straight six was everywhere! It’s the subject of our latest build.

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: From a Flat-Head to a Chrysler Slant-Six, from a Ford FE to a boosted Chevy Straight-Six From a Flat-Head to a Chrysler Slant-Six, from a Ford FE to a boosted Chevy Straight-Six, Mike and Pat celebrate their vintage builds and how they turned retro into big modern muscle.

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: Mike and Pat Have the High-Performance Tips and Techniques for More Horsepower Go from the boneyard to making big power! Mike and Pat have the high-performance tips and techniques to help you get the most horsepower and torque with some savings to boot!

programme.title: Engine Power

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: A Fine Inline Six Ford Needs Upgrades Even after 45 years, our antique Ford engine still runs. And after some needed upgrades, it will run like a champ!

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: Scavenged Small Block Ford We took a mysterious engine that was hidden away in our shop and filled it with whatever parts we could find lying around. Here’s what happened!

programme.title: Engine Power

programme.title: Truck Tech

programme.desc: How Does a Stock Jeep JL Rubicon Perform? Our Wrangler Unlimited Rubicon Hits the trails. We find out what the JL needs to survive on the 2019 XOR Adventure.

programme.desc: Pit Pass at a NHRA Race Weekend Meet the graduates of SAMTech who have found a home in NHRA racing.

programme.title: Carcass
programme.desc: Baja Makeover The Carcass duo adds a custom fit roll cage, fabricated louvers out back, and a whole bunch of style points to this baja style bug. This is part 2 of 3 of the BajAwesome build.

programme.title: Music City Trucks

programme.title: Truck Tech

programme.desc: Modding a Mustang GT for an Aggressive Look We add a body kit and a wrap to our EBC Brakes giveaway Mustang plus, Tommy and Marc bring back the Hellcat '69 Charger.

programme.title: XOR - Xtreme Off-Road
programme.desc: JL Rubicon: Tires and Under Armor Our Jeep Wrangler Unlimited Rubicon gets brand new tires and some much needed under armor. Plus, our 2001 Tacoma gets a spray-on bed liner.

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: A Little Science + A Little Money = Triple the Power? Building a 363ci race bullet that can take hours of track punishment, Mike and Pat dial in a small block Ford engine delivering almost triple the power for an endurance race team.

programme.title: Carcass
programme.desc: Retro Baja Bug Baja Style bug gets a 80's retro style paint job to go along with a long travel suspension before the Carcass team takes this incredible combo to Dirty Turtle Offroad Park. This is Part 3 of 3 of the BajAwesome build.

programme.title: Music City Trucks
programme.desc: TrashHawk The guys visit DBR Performance and their first chance ever to drive a Jeep TrackHawk, which inspires a plan of their own…to turn an old Wagoneer into a screaming street monster.

programme.desc: Beware! Hidden Dangers Caught on Tape On this special edition of The Maury Show, Maury brings celebrity guests to the stage to share some of the most intense and shocking real-life footage ever caught on tape.

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: Mom, Your Man is a Cheater! New mom Danica received 5 different emails from 5 women claiming that they slept with her man Jimmy in her home. Then, will Renee's man choose his addiction over his family?

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Pricey Pleasures Bambi gives us a rare, honest look into her ultra-exclusive lifestyle in LA. Tiffany confronts C.T. over a rotten business deal.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: A Tragic Accident Rebecca left her baby with fianc James and his mother Adeline, only to discover that her baby was hospitalized. Rebecca suspects that James is responsible. Adeline blames her for the babys death!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Im Starving Myself to Death Pamela aims to weigh 40 pounds. Samantha, who suffers from bulimia and alcoholism, steals to accomplish her binging. Can both women confront their eating disorders with support and treatment?

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Crawl to Your Wife After surviving a wild car chase, losing her leg, and being comatose due to her husband, Portia will finally confront him. He won't admit fault, but today Steves helping Portia find her voice.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: You Won't Marry Him! Friends and family refuse to accept same sex marriage! Martin wont let his son to marry his boyfriend. April wants her ex back, but hes in love with a man! Who has the final say?

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: Shocking Results Where Are They Now? Today on MAURY, well get you caught up with some of our most exciting guests. Their paternity results shocked everyone. What happened after the answers were revealed and these guests went back to their lives?

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: I Never Let You Go Chrishon denies hes engaged to Taiwana with 3 weeks until their wedding. Lauren confronts her ex for leaving her for another woman while pregnant! Dave still wants Leesas love.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Honey This Is My Real Job! Chloe and Dan will tie the knot soon, but shes finally ready to tell him about her real job.Then Amandas mom begs her to quit her job.

programme.desc: Did My Fiance Cheat With My Mom? MAURYs guests have been keeping devastating secrets from their loved ones and it is tearing them up inside. They are ready to come clean, even if it means losing their relationships! Will their loved ones stay or go?

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: Women At War! Shocking Test Results! On Todays MAURY these men say they know a paternity test will reveal what theyve known all along they didn't father the children of the women who brought them here. The women are ready to prove them wrong!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: My Teen Daughter Wants a Baby 17-year-old Naomi has undergone a sudden attitude change and is on a mission to have a baby. Parents Leeanders and April need Steve to intervene!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: You Stole 15 Years of My Life Jennifer left home to protect herself from her stepdad Allen. 15 years later, her mother wants a second chance, but Jennifer is hesitant. Can Steve help mend this broken family?

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: She Is My Property Lanikka is sick and tired of her boyfriend Malcoms abusive ways. Then, Tims jealousy has torn his family apart, but now hes desperate to win them back, but will Tiffany leave him for good?

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Sizzling Sex Secrets! Torrance admits to cheating on his girlfriend with a shocking twist. Then, Heather wants her boyfriends ex Tramisha to stop interfering with their relationship.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Guess What? I'm Cheating Done with her abusive relationship, Carla tells her boyfriend that she is cheating on him with his roommate. Then, Jay wants to tell Nikki she slept with her lover Crystal.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Guess Who I'm Leaving You For! John is cheating on his wife Destinee with Cici, but Cici's got some secrets too. Then, Lala drops a bombshell on her man. Plus Michael and his wife Tayliana both have secrets to reveal to each other.

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: I'll Prove Her Baby's Not Mine! These women are here with some burning questions! Kendra wants her husband Richard to admit hes the father of their child AND his mistress child! Jevon and his family dont think hes the father of Jazmines child! Only MAURY has the answers!

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: I'll Prove Your 5 Kids Are Not Mine! Eddies mom Grace wont let them live with her unless Kay Kay can prove that her son Eddie fathered her grandchild. Then, Troy denies that hes the father of all 5 of Vanessas babies. But when the results arrive, will he be proven wrong or right?

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: You're Twice My Daughter's Age, You Cheater! Furious mom Patty wants to prove that her daughters boyfriend Dale, a man twice her daughters age, has been cheating. Then did Bam cheat on Brianna in his own bed?

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: These Women Lied The 3 Kids Aren't Mine! Keisha knows that Desmond fathered her baby, but he wants her out of his life! Then, 2 desperate moms confront the man who fathered their 3 kids!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: You Waited 17 Years For This! Since Chris was 3 months old, his grandma Anne raised and told him that his mother Hollie was abusive and tried to harm him. Now Chris and Hollie are going to meet for the first time on our stage.

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: You Slept With THAT Man? LaShawna and her boyfriend James will learn if her friend Coral harmed her child years ago. Shell also admit that she cheated with Coral. How will he react when he finds out another bombshell?

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Steve vs. Buddy Buddy spends his days smoking and playing videos games, rather than providing for his family. His girlfriend Holly works to provide for everyone including their special needs child, but is fed up!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Return of the Past Guests Part 2 Jaycee shows Brandy that its never ok to cheat and ruin a family. Casi feels her fianc could learn a lesson from past guest Kevin. Plus, we set viewer Tamara and guest Nathan up on a date.

programme.title: Drama
programme.desc: Not The Devil It’s present day and Matthew, who lives on an East-London council estate has become obsessed with his neighbor Jo. Matthew wants her and he wants to be her. Jo is transgender and struggling to cope with terminal cancer. Unable to provide for herself through a steady income Jo has had to resort to prostitution. One day Matthew’s strict religious parents catch him cross dressing and to punish him they lock him away. But Matthew breaks free and goes in search of Jo, determined to be the centre of her attention one way or another.

programme.title: Drama
programme.desc: In The Mirror Joëlle is not your average father. Her life is in full reconstruction after a sex reassignment, when her son suddenly leaves the family home and follows her to New York. She's not ready to play the doting father. She can tell her son the contrary, he can see that she's gone down a notch. She can't take being constantly scrutinized and judged by every Tom, Dick and Harry. Her son's arrival might just be the last straw. It's emotional swings and roundabouts which won't leave you the same person.

programme.title: Drama
programme.desc: Hell or High Water Hell or High Water is a short film that tells the story of a young pastor loved and adored by the people around him. Things change for him when he must confront a hidden truth about himself a truth that could make or break him psychologically. But, whatever decision he makes, he is still going to crash and burn, for life as he once knew it would never be the same again. The story explores the reality of sexuality amidst spirituality, exorcism, blackmail, and family life. ''Hell or High Water'' challenges stereotypical narratives about sexuality.

programme.title: Thriller
programme.desc: Playback Un policier enquête sur la disparition d'un adolescent et découvre un sombre secret.

programme.title: Documentary
programme.desc: Gay Positive Gay Positive educates viewers about the controversial ban on queer men donating blood in the USA. The film captures opinions of people from all walks of life, asking, If you were in need of blood would you take it from a queer? Organizations are forced to reject healthy individuals from donating. During the filming of this documentary, Mexico and the UK lifted their ban, while the FDA insists it remain. Through insightful conversations with Laverne Cox, Rutanya Alda, Blanche Baker, Jim Colucci, Frank DeCaro, Trapper Felides, Tiago Grade, Carly Hughes, Chelsey Keding, Yetta Kurland, Lisa Lampanelli, Vincent Leggett, Danny Logan, Dave McRee, Anthony Lee Medina, Eric Millegan, Kaitlin Monte, Tym Moss, Garry Novikoff, Athena Reich, and Justin Luke Zirilli; Gay Positive raises public awareness on the potential benefits of lifting the ban.

programme.title: Documentary
programme.desc: A Year in Transition An intimate, affirming documentary following a 20-year-old Arab-American trans man in his first year of transition as he begins taking hormones, goes through gender confirmation surgery, and finds his place in the trans community. ‘A Year in Transition’ is also unique in that the Director / Producer is a transman who is a member of the community that is represented in the film.

programme.title: Documentary
programme.desc: Positive YouTubers An experimental documentary film all made online with footage material recorded from the computer desktop screen, about 4 Brazilians who have created Youtube Channels to talk openly about their HIV status, in a very positive way. Final semester project of Digital Anthropology discipline within the Master of Arts in Media and Visual Anthropology at Freie Universität Berlin.

programme.title: Drama
programme.desc: Fauk My Life The day before Amy leaves for college, her parents prepare a going away dinner. Invited are Amy's best friend, Kaitline, and her boyfriend, Thomas. While at the local basketball court for one last time before they head off, Amy confides in Kaitline and after dinner, Thomas approaches Amy's parents regarding their future. As the day of emotions comes to an end and her departure time grows nearer, Amy is left with a couple of surprises from both Kaitline and Thomas.

programme.title: Drama
programme.desc: FMWBH: Fucking My Way Back Home Follows a sex worker and her driver over the course of one night as she struggles to raise the cash to cover the arrears on her recently deceased mother's mortgage before returning to her hometown to claim the child her mother has been raising.

programme.title: Comedy
programme.desc: Death to Prom Two best friends make the best of going to high school by dreaming up a fashion magazine photo shoots. When a shy soccer player with a soft spot for poetry leads to competing invitations to the prom, their high-fashion drama could destroy their friendship… along with the entire prom.

programme.title: Life is Easy
programme.desc: What’s a Beard? S1 E4 | A painfully white dinner turns into an expose while sexual chemistry brews on both sides.

programme.title: Comedy
programme.desc: Magic H8 Ball Burned by a cheating boyfriend (and some mild chlamydia), a heartbroken pushover turns to a mysterious Magic 8 Ball for the answers. But as he starts giving into his impulses, he risks his hurt turning into hate-and losing all control.

programme.title: Comedy
programme.desc: Femme From executive producer Rachel Brosnahan (The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel), comes a hilarious and moving story of self-acceptance. After being rejected for being too Femme, Carson learns to embrace his truth by way of a drag queen fairy godmother.

programme.title: Comedy
programme.desc: Baby Steps From Oscar-winning Producer Li-Kong Hsu (Ang Lee’s The Wedding Banquet, Crouching Tiger Hidden Dragon, Eat Drink Man Woman) and Stephen Israel (Swimming With Sharks and G.B.F.), comes this multi-cultural comedy-drama, which takes a funny but honest look at gay family issues in complicated dynamo of a cross-generational Taiwanese and American family. Danny, a Taiwanese-American man, longs to have a baby with his American partner Tate, but their attempts at international surrogacy are complicated by Danny’s meddling mother, who wants to control every aspect of the process -- all the way from Taipei.

programme.title: Documentary
programme.desc: My Name Was January When a trans sister, January Marie Lapuz, is brutally murdered in her own home in New Westminster, BC, her community reacts and her friends and other trans women of colour come to share and voice their issues, concerns, and challenges. January was seen as a bright light in the lives of many. This is the story of January, a friend, a daughter, a person. This film will not only bring justice to January, but to all the women who have lost their lives.

programme.title: Documentary
programme.desc: Vianey “Vianey” is a hard-hitting documentary portrait about the life and misfortunes of the New Jersey and New York based underground hip hop artist Vianey Otero, also known by the name So Icey Trap.

programme.title: Drama
programme.desc: The Remains O Que Resta is the story of an isolated house - always crowded with friends, lovers, music, laughter, where the parties happen for no particular reason, the frustrations and repressed desires of a young middle class couple finally reach the point of eruption. Bárbara and Luiz seem to have finally got rid of the vague artistic ambitions they cherished at the age of twenty. Attached to jobs they hate, exhausted by the demands imposed by an increasingly expensive and chaotic city, the couple finds occasional comfort by visiting, the mountain property of Yuri, a wealthy friend of the couple. Both Barbara and Luiz will eventually be forced to deal with the repressed passion they feel for their long-time friend, as well as the personal frustrations they have been ignoring for years. Times that return, bodies that meet, vices that remain.

programme.title: Documentary
programme.desc: Wrangler: Anatomy of an Icon From the dawn of the sexual revolution comes the outrageous and true story of 1970s gay porn icon Jack Wrangler. Jack rose to become a major brand name in adult entertainment, as well as a hero to the newly liberated gay population, only to cross over to straight movies and fall in love with famous vocalist Margaret Whiting.

programme.title: Barbelle
programme.desc: Episode 4 S2 E4 | Richard shows off the first episode of his reality show masterpiece: Heartbreak Tour, Tour Life.

programme.title: Barbelle
programme.desc: Episode 6 S2 E6 | Alice records an episode on Tommy’s podcast and lets slip some revealing information.

programme.title: Easy Abby
programme.desc: Chicago Free Fall S1 E13 | In the Season One Finale, Detective Lydia tries to ask Abby out on a date but Abby is focused on Danielle, the first woman to ever truly spark Abby's heart, but will it be too late?

programme.title: The Dorians
programme.desc: The Dorians TV Toast 2020 The brightest stars in TV stop by Karel's virtual pub in Las Vegas for the Society of LGBTQ Entertainment Critics inaugural Dorians TV Toast 2020 on Revry. Watch as Hugh Jackman, Lea Delaria, Laverne Cox, Alex Newell, Thomas Roberts, Billy Porter and so many more Toast the best in TV as Karel orchestrates from all over the world.

programme.title: Comedy
programme.desc: Lolo A coming-of-age comedy where Lolo, an 11-year-old boy, and his best friends are trying to understand their sexuality and identities.

programme.title: Documentary
programme.desc: Cancerpants A community rallies around a woman battling breast cancer in this warm and insightful story of triumph that will arm women with cancer worldwide.

programme.title: Awards Show
programme.desc: QueerX Live! Watch Jennifer Lopez, Angelica Ross, Karamo, Isiah Thomas and Joe Biden on QueerX Live!–the award show, music, and film streaming special for the 2020 QueerX LGBTQ+ film, music, and culture festival. Featuring performances by VINCINT, ROB.B "Heartthrob Robb", Faultlines, Debby Holiday, Shea Diamond, and the winners of the HBO Max Original vogue competition, The House of Balmain, QueerX Live! will screen all the winners of the QueerX 2020 film competition. Additional speakers and guests include: AmbersCloset, Blossom Brown, Sarah Kate Ellis (CEO of GLAAD), and Carmen Carrera.

programme.title: Documentary
programme.desc: São Paulo in Hi-Fi A historical documentary about Sao Paulo's gay night life during the 60's, 70's and 80's.

programme.title: Drama
programme.desc: Kill Me to Death Following the suicide of a nobody actress in a dying arts scene, the six struggling musicians who saw her last confront their own mortality in this lo-fi exploration of suicide, depression, gender identity and punk rock. “Music and suicide have long had a nearly-synonymous relationship in the Pacific Northwest, almost to the point of cliché, but director Danny Denial’s goal was to look at it from a different perspective. One that neither glamorizes nor demonizes those suffering.”—KEXP.

programme.title: People TV - 2021
programme.desc: Celebrity Pet Matchmaker: Anafrancesca & Brittany Full House star and animal advocate Andrea Barber meets Anafrancesca who is looking for the perfect dog to add to her pack after a breakup. She brings her sister Brittany along to help make a decision, but will both fall in puppy love?

programme.title: People TV - 2021
programme.desc: 07/06/21 | Dale Earnhardt Jr.; Arielle Vandenberg Lost Speedways' Dale Earnhardt Jr. and 'Love Island' star Arielle Vandenberg join host Daryn Carp to recap the biggest stories and best moments in reality TV.

programme.title: People TV - 2021
programme.desc: People in the '90s: Margaret Cho Actress and comedian Margaret Cho knows a lot about those '90s worst-dressed lists because Joan Rivers was her mentor, and she was on Fashion Police and appeared in PEOPLE's 1995 Best and Worst Dressed Issue. We go back with Margaret as she honors Joan, explains how the culture of roasting evolved, and opens up about how the decade shaped her own body image. We also discuss her groundbreaking sitcom All-American Girl and how she once watched John Travolta eat an entire pie on the set of 1997's Face/Off.

programme.title: People TV - 2021
programme.desc: 07/01/21 | Prince William & Prince Harry Reunite for Princess Diana's Birthday + Screen Time with QuestLove Prince William and Prince Harry put their differences aside to honor Princess Diana on her 60th birthday, Britney Spears wants "big changes" as she fights to end conservatorship, and baby news for Cardi B, Gal Gadot, Ewan McGregor and Freida Pinto

programme.title: People TV - 2021
programme.desc: Celebrity Pet Matchmaker: James & Mark Full House star and animal advocate Andrea Barber meets James and Mark (who have a pack of three dogs at home already!) to help find a perfect pup addition for their family. Which rescue will steal their hearts and be a match for Doug, Theo and Pippi?

programme.title: People TV - 2021

programme.title: People TV - 2021
programme.desc: Martha Bakes: Muffins & Popovers Martha makes her blueberry muffins two ways, flavored with a little spice or finished with a crumb topping. She then demonstrates how to make airy popovers, equally suited to serving with fresh blueberry preserves or savory creamed spinach.

programme.desc: 07/28/21 | Support Pours in for Simone Biles amid Mental Health Struggle + Luke Bryan Opens Up About Family Tragedy Our latest celebrity news, top headlines, and what's trending on July 28.

programme.desc: Luke Bryan In this exclusive interview with Luke Bryan, the country music superstar, husband, and father opens up about his new docuseries, "Luke Bryan: My Dirt Road Diary," how he’s managed to triumph over the major tragedies in his life, and how he hopes his story will help inspire others.

programme.title: People TV - 2021
programme.desc: Martha Bakes: Meringue Martha shares the secrets to foolproof meringue, such as using a copper bowl and adding a touch of cream of tartar. Once the basics are mastered, Martha teaches one of her favorites, pavlova with passion fruit, plus an impressive île flottante and a Huguenot torte.

programme.title: People TV - 2021
programme.desc: People Every Day: DJ D-Nice Club Quarantine’s DJ D-Nice gives us his top music picks to keep you dancing through the rest of summer.

programme.title: People TV - 2021
programme.desc: Martha Bakes: Biscuits & Scones Biscuits and scones are the perfect way to start the day. Martha shows how to make buttermilk biscuits, angel biscuits and cream scones.

programme.title: People TV - 2021
programme.desc: Jungle Cruise World Premiere Red Carpet All aboard! EW and PEOPLE bring you the world premiere of the long-awaited adventure film Jungle Cruise starring Dwayne Johnson and Emily Blunt, and based on the Disney theme park ride. We’ll take you to the red carpet from Disneyland with EW executive editor Patrick Gomez and PEOPLE senior editor Melody Chiu.

programme.title: People TV - 2021
programme.desc: Martha Bakes: Pâte Sucrée Martha demonstrates how easy it is to create elegant desserts based on the classic crust commonly known as tart dough but called pâte sucrée, or sweet pastry, in professional kitchens. Learn how to make a traditional lemon mousse damask tart with candied lemon peel, and a contemporary chocolate tart shell layered with homemade caramel and chocolate ganache and finished with a sprinkling of sea salt.

programme.title: People TV - 2021

programme.desc: MADE FROM SCRATCH - Dave East Artists and their families share the love and feed the soul with a home-cooked meal. In this episode; Dave East and his mother and father get busy on the breakfast side - sharing their favorite meal of Steak and Eggs. Join the family in Engelwood, New Jersey as Dave talks about his father’s positive influence on his life, spending his first check on the family, plus the importance of cultivating a strong work ethic, leading to his role as Method Man in “Wu Tang: An American Saga”. Grab a seat at the table as they share their personal stories and the special meaning behind their menu.

programme.title: I Can Hear Your Voice

programme.title: I Can Hear Your Voice

programme.title: I Can Hear Your Voice

programme.title: BLACKPINK HOUSE
programme.desc: BLACKPINK House: S1 E5 BLACKPINK members spend the day in Koh Samui playing water sports, eating great foods, and exploring the island's diverse culture. The next day, BLACKPINK goes to experience zipline per Rosé's suggestion.

programme.title: BLACKPINK HOUSE
programme.desc: BLACKPINK House: S1 E6 It is a New Year in the BLACKPINK House! The members prepare sliced rice cake soup per Korean tradition. BLACKPINK also goes to an amusement park and find themselves in the middle of a safari zoo. Rosé and Lisa prepare a surprise visit to support Jisoo's last day as MC of SBS Inkigayo.

programme.title: BLACKPINK HOUSE
programme.desc: BLACKPINK House: S1 E7 BLACKPINK members split into two pairs to go on a day adventure. Each member chooses an activity they have always wanted to do. Lisa and Rosé try archery and trampolines, while Jisoo and Jennie try making accessories and rollerskating.

programme.title: BLACKPINK HOUSE
programme.desc: BLACKPINK House: S1 E8 BLACKPINK is in Japan for a tour! After a successful concert, the members buy groceries for some home-cooking. The members split to explore the day on their own. Rosé goes to the LP record shop and aquarium while Jisoo goes to a dog school. Rosé and Jennie compete in bowling.

programme.title: BLACKPINK DIARIES
programme.desc: BLACKPINK Diaries: S1 E5 LA; Jisoo trying out some English; Rosé and nachos; lots of interviews; NY; The Late Show; shopping at Target; Good Morning America; and Happy Birthday Rosé.

programme.title: BLACKPINK DIARIES
programme.desc: BLACKPINK Diaries: S1 E6 flight to Malaysia; Rosé's injured and wrapped foot; partition argument of Rosé and Lisa; Kuala Lumpur; Rosé massaging Lisa; ; Lisa gives a 'famous Thai-style massage' to Rosé, whose ticklish; Jennie's severe allergies during the tour; Jennie and Jisoo worried about tight comeback schedule, and dropped by a convenience store to get treats.

programme.title: BLACKPINK DIARIES
programme.desc: BLACKPINK Diaries: S1 E7 flight to Taipei; Lisa trying more street food; crane games; last crew dinner for Asia Tour; KTL dance practice hopping; jacket photoshoot; and Jisoo and Lisa's new, private handshake.

programme.title: AKMU Special Ep.1
programme.desc: WINNER Music Video Special A uniquely curated playlist features an unrivaled blend of original music videos of WINNER from YG Entertainment.

programme.title: AKMU Special Ep.1
programme.desc: BIGBANG Music Video Special Part 2 A uniquely curated playlist features an unrivaled blend of original music videos of BIGBANG from YG Entertainment.

programme.title: AKMU Special Ep.1
programme.desc: W-LOG: S1 E1 W-LOG is a reality show featuring behind episodes WINNER’s performance tours in seven cities–Seattle, San Francisco, LA, Dallas, Chicago, Toronto, and NY–across North America. This show depicts everyday life in the form of Vlog (Video + Blog) by WINNER members.

programme.title: 24-365 with BLACKPINK
programme.desc: 24/365 with BLACKPINK: S1 E4 The members play a telepathy game to get items for their meal. They can choose an ingredient, but they cannot tell the other members what they have chosen; they have to guess what the previous member chose through telepathy.

programme.title: 24-365 with BLACKPINK
programme.desc: 24/365 with BLACKPINK: S1 E6 At the YG Entertainment facility, the members celebrated their fourth anniversary as a group, preparing a special dance of the choreography of "How You Like That" dressed as characters from the movie Frozen. After a raffle, Rosé had to dress up as Princess Anna, Jisoo as Elsa, Lisa as Olaf, and Jennie as Kristoff. Then, the renowned South Korean magician Choi Hyun Woo was invited, who performed a series of magic tricks on the members.

programme.title: 24-365 with BLACKPINK
programme.desc: 24/365 with BLACKPINK: S1 E7 The members attended a karting club, where they held fast lap competitions throughout the circuit. Finally, Jennie was the winner, followed by Jisoo, then Rosé, and finally, Lisa. Well-known South Korean sportscasters Kim Dae-gyeom and Jung Jun-son were invited to comment on the competitions.

programme.title: 24-365 with BLACKPINK
programme.desc: 24/365 with BLACKPINK: S1 E8 Continuing on the karting circuit, the members performed two more competitions. The first was a one-lap sprint, where Jennie was the winner, followed by Jisoo, then Lisa, and finally, Rosé. In the next test, signs were incorporated with clues that they had to memorize to answer a secret question finally. After several laps for not getting the correct answer, finally, the winner was Jisoo, followed by Jennie, Rosé, and finally, Lisa.

programme.title: BLACKPINK HOUSE
programme.desc: BLACKPINK House: S1 E9 BLACKPINK has their day off in a Korean-style sauna (JjimJilBang), then goes to play some snowboarding. Will they survive the extreme sports of snowboarding or enjoy sleds? Watch to find out!

programme.title: BLACKPINK HOUSE
programme.desc: BLACKPINK House: S1 E10 BLACKPINK members travel to Jeju! They partake in a maze race with Jisoo and Lisa competing against Jennie and Rosé. They also further explore the island by eating great foods and getting on a hot air balloon.

programme.title: BLACKPINK HOUSE
programme.desc: BLACKPINK House: S1 E11 Jisoo and Lisa visit a tangerine farm to harvest some fruit while Rosé and Jennie try horseback riding. It is their last day in the BLACKPINK house as their 100 days of vacation comes to an end. The members come together to cook a last supper in the house and share their memories.

programme.title: BLACKPINK HOUSE
programme.desc: BLACKPINK House: S1 E12 Special BLACKPINK House episode! What have BLACKPINK members been up to the last few months? Watch as BLACKPINK is preparing their comeback and go on about their daily lives.

programme.title: BLACKPINK DIARIES
programme.desc: BLACKPINK Diaries: S1 E11 Jenchu at the Georgia aquarium; Jisoo is determined to see sharks all around the world; Rosé and Lisa also go at a later time; up close with the penguins; Jenchu crawling through all the kid tunnels; face painting; concert in Atlanta; and reminiscing about the North America Tour.

programme.title: BLACKPINK DIARIES
programme.desc: BLACKPINK Diaries: S1 E12 BLACKPINK in Europe; Amsterdam; Rosé and Heeju (BLACKPINK's stylist from Episode 3) to the Rijksmuseum; Rosé as the art critic and impersonator; AFAS Live; Manchester; and Lisa had a her new doll.

programme.title: BLACKPINK DIARIES
programme.desc: BLACKPINK Diaries: S1 E13 London; Lisa's weird under-stage singing; Berlin; Paris; Parisian bags of Jisoo and Rosé; Jisoo with a Mona Lisa dab shirt; carousel was closed; Barcelona; more Lisa weird singing while Rosé enjoys wings; The Europe tour is over; and showing off the camera-shy staff.

programme.title: AKMU Special Ep.1
programme.desc: YG Family Music Video Special A uniquely curated playlist features an unrivaled blend of original music videos of the K-Pop artists (SECHSKIES, AKMU, iKON, TREASURE, and more) from YG Entertainment.

programme.title: 24-365 with BLACKPINK
programme.desc: 24/365 with BLACKPINK: S1 E9 The members moved to a pet food store, where they made homemade food for their own pets. Jisoo and Lisa made salmon and pumpkin muffins, while Jennie and Rosé made chicken, paprika, carrot, and spinach kimbap.

programme.title: 24-365 with BLACKPINK
programme.desc: 24/365 with BLACKPINK: S1 E10 A special behind-the-scenes episode of the film's filming for "Ice Cream," the group's new single, performed with Selena Gomez. The members are seen enjoying the colorful filming set, especially the moments with the two pets who participated in the video, a capybara and a dog that worked alongside Rosé.

programme.title: 24-365 with BLACKPINK
programme.desc: 24/365 with BLACKPINK: S1 E11 The members participate in the Game of Balance, answering questions to choose between two extreme alternatives. His answers are compared with those given by his fans, which were received via the internet previously.

programme.title: BLACKPINK DIARIES
programme.desc: BLACKPINK Diaries: S1 E14 Macao; Lisa's weird singing; flight to Australia; Jisoo calling Lisa as 'Lali'; Rosé already in Melbourne giving a tour of her Jr. High favorite places; Jisoo has Dalgomie socks; Rod Laver Arena; and Lisa at the aquarium.

programme.title: BLACKPINK DIARIES
programme.desc: BLACKPINK Diaries: S1 E15 Lisa's Cam; Sydney; koalas at the zoo; more weird Lisa singing; Aussie Aussie Aussie - Oi! Oi Oi!; Aussie convenience store; Aussie money comes in monopoly money colors; meat pies; back to Bangkok for Encore; Jisoo's self-interview; Jennie exposing her 2-year photo log (her 2nd Instagram); Lisa talking to the Thai Blinks in Thai; 6th-month end of Tour reminiscence; looking forward to the next world tour.

programme.title: BLACKPINK DIARIES
programme.desc: BLACKPINK Diaries: S1 E16 3rd Anniversary Private Stage; backstage at the fan meeting; some performance clips; some game clips; some solo clips; some special one-time performances; a giant cake; messages from fans; and the Chapter 1 is over.

programme.title: AKMU Special Ep.1
programme.desc: BIGBANG Music Video Special Part 3 A uniquely curated playlist features an unrivaled blend of original music videos of BIGBANG from YG Entertainment.

programme.title: 24-365 with BLACKPINK
programme.desc: 24/365 with BLACKPINK: S1 E12 In a classroom, the members played at re-creating their first day of school. With the participation of the South Korean comedian Jae-sung Hwang as a teacher, they had to choose the president of the course, Lisa is chosen, and they had to complete an eating test without the teacher discovering them, resulting in Jennie, the winner.

programme.title: 24-365 with BLACKPINK
programme.desc: 24/365 with BLACKPINK: S1 E13 On the second day, the members had a special class of activities, where the final winner will become the school's assistant principal. The first game consisted of dancing to a song and stopping as close to 15 seconds. The winner was Lisa. In the second game, they had to pass in relays, ping pong balls on spoons held by their mouths, one by one, where they achieved the goal of 3 balls in less than 90 seconds.

programme.title: 24-365 with BLACKPINK
programme.desc: 24/365 with BLACKPINK: S1 E14 Unreleased footage from the filming of the music video for their latest single "Lovesick Girls" was revealed. They are seen having fun on the set of a convenience store, Lisa trying to wreck a car with a baseball bat, Rosé trying to cry for a scene, Jennie driving a vehicle with the members on board, and Jisoo filming in a fake rain. at 7 a.m.

programme.title: BLACKPINK HOUSE

programme.title: BLACKPINK HOUSE
programme.desc: BLACKPINK House: S1 E4 In Bangkok, unknown guests come and prepare special gifts for BLACKPINK while they are gone. programme.title: Nollywood - Romance
programme.desc: Naked Lies They are friends with different personality. They love to conquer while he loves to fix. In their smartness they find themselves entangle in a web that has the power to tear them apart forever. Is their friendship enough to withstand this storm?

programme.title: THE JIMI BENDEL SHOW
programme.desc: Episode 1: DOMESTIC VIOLENCE Part 1 Pilot episode for the new adventures of Jimi Bendel. He’s interview on a radio talk show scored high ratings with the fans, so much so that the station offers him his very own show! One of the callers says he knows who killed Jimi’s father.

programme.title: THE JIMI BENDEL SHOW
programme.desc: Episode 2: DOMESTIC VIOLENCE Part 2 Jimi is determined against all odds, to find and help an anonymous caller on show, with some help from his unwilling friend in the Nigerian Police Force. Meanwhile, Mandy makes him understand that it is unethical to interfere in the lives of their fans.

programme.desc: E01: Meet the Cokers Meet the Cokers

programme.desc: Thwarted E01

programme.title: April
programme.desc: April: EP01 Adeyemi came back home after days while his wife (April) confronted him & accuse him of cheating on their marriage which leads to a fight also their hotel family business also suffers a set back too.

programme.title: April
programme.desc: April: EP02 APRIL moves on to take over the hotel business from Adeyemi the husband to avoid more set backs from the hotel family business while on the other hand Adeyemi side chicks seek more attentions & commitment from Adeyemi.

programme.title: Room 420
programme.desc: The truth The real story.

programme.title: Nollywood - Drama
programme.desc: The Return A lost prince which return to claim back his throne

programme.title: Nollywood - Drama
programme.desc: Children of Mud A young woman and her blind brother search for hope on the mean streets, after getting kicked out of their home.

programme.title: Nollywood - Drama
programme.desc: Just A Night A girl who slept with her ex a night to her wedding day She has a son, but unknowingly to her husband the son belongs to her ex-boyfriend. The ex-boyfriend came looking for his son & trouble began, the BIG secret is about to be EXPOSE.

programme.title: Nollywood - Drama
programme.desc: Dear Bayo The storyline follows love affair between a youth corper Bayo who plays the titular role and Ebipade, a humble girl both are from humble backgrounds are smitten by each other but have to overcome obstacles in their personal lives to be together forever.

programme.title: Nollywood - Thriller
programme.desc: Run An uptight young woman who lives a dull routine life goes on a run one night and witnesses something that puts her in situations she has never been in and sends her life spiraling out of control.

programme.title: Nollywood - Thriller
programme.desc: A Break From Reality+F21 A schizophrenic re-lives a childhood trauma when she becomes entangled in a murder investigation.

programme.title: Nollywood - Romance
programme.desc: Husband Material A girl meet a man on internet falls in love with him Plans on making herself a Mrs on the first date by getting pregnant, unknown to her that the man in question is her half sisters husband.

programme.title: Nollywood - Comedy
programme.desc: The Apartment A woman’s ghost occupies an apartment, on the verge of finding out the cause of her death.

programme.title: Nollywood - Romance
programme.desc: White Wash They had a plan, but he also has his own plan. She expected him to keep to his own end of the plan but he wanted her out of the way. They were face to face with their lies and there is nowhere to run. She has to do something to prove her point but what she fail to understand was that she too was guilty…

programme.title: Nollywood - Drama
programme.desc: Holy Ruse A woman is starved of love and marital intimacy by her husband, under the pretext of religion and spirituality

programme.title: AfroLandTV - Drama
programme.desc: The Herbert Macaulay Affair The Herbert Macaulay Affair is a story that follows Young Herbert who returns from England and begins the opposition to the colonial government.

programme.title: Nollywood - Romance
programme.desc: Me & Him ME & HIM follows the lives of Faridah (a female bartender with problems bar gages from different aspects of life ) and Chris ( a young man who has problems with his family & trying to make its on his own). Faith join them when Chris needs to pay his house rent & must get a flat mate in order to do so they must learn to live together dealing with friends , family and the bar drama .

programme.title: Resen - Aventuras
programme.desc: Los ejecutores Un jefe de la mafia se enfurece cuando se convierte en sospechoso de contrabando de un cargamento de heroína en San Francisco. Enviará entonces a su sobrino, un reconocido abogado anglo-siciliano, para identificar al verdadero culpable. El abogado también le pedirá ayuda a su mejor amigo, un piloto de carreras con ganas de aventuras.

programme.title: Erno - Western
programme.desc: El Hombre de Oklahoma El doctor John Brighton está de camino a California pero después de sufrir la terrible pérdida de su mujer cuando ésta da a luz, decide quedarse en Oklahoma. Alquila una habitación en la casa de la Señora Fitzgerald para criar a su recién nacida hija, Louise. Tiempo después las cosas han cambiado.

programme.title: Resen - Aventuras
programme.desc: Los mercenarios de los diamantes Ellos son profesionales que matan por deber, ¿pero qué ocurre si el hombre al que deben enfrentarse mata por placer?

programme.title: Resen - Drama
programme.desc: Sospecha Un atractivo vividor coincide en el tren con una joven ingenua que acabará teniendo que pagarle el billete. Más adelante, vuelven a encontrarse en una fiesta y, tras un breve romance, ella decide casarse con él, a pesar de la oposición de su padre. Considerada por todos, incluida su familia, una solterona, está empeñada en demostrarles que alguien la puede amar.

programme.title: Resen - Terror
programme.desc: Los tomates asesinos atacan de nuevo El ayudante de policía Lance Goyle tiene que investigar los misteriosos ataques de unos tomates asesinos para lo que cuenta con una experta en tomates, El creador de los tomates, Mortimer Gangrena, quiere matar a la tomatóloga porque se interpone en sus planes de conquistar el mundo

programme.title: Historia de la Iglesia Católica
programme.desc: La Iglesia actual La Iglesia actual vive un momento complicado debido debido a una falta preocupante de vocaciones y de un desapego de los fieles para con su iglesia. Para intentar solucionarlo figuras comio Juan Pablo II o el actual papa Francisco han sacado al papado fuera de los mueros del Vaticano para acercarse al pueblo y a sus poroblemas cotidianos.

programme.title: Resen - Terror
programme.desc: Los tomates asesinos se comen Francia Michael se enamora de una campesina francesa y cuando visitan París presencian el rapto de tomate peludo, un tomate bueno y se deciden a rescatarlo. Mientras, el profesor Mortimer Gangrena tiene el plan de realizar la profecía de Nostradamus por la que volverá el Rey de francia, que casualmente se parece a su lacayo, Igor

programme.title: Resen - Comedia
programme.desc: Pagina en blanco La situación económica de una pareja de aristócratas ingleses, Victor (Cary Grant) y Hillary (Deborah Kerr), es tan precaria que deciden convertir su castillo en un centro de atracción turística. Charles Delacro (Robert Mitchum), un millonario americano, magnate del petróleo, después de una visita guiada, se encapricha con Hillary. Otra aristócrata, Hattie Durant (Jean Simmons), se verá también involucrada en la vida amorosa de la pareja.

programme.title: Resen - Comedia
programme.desc: Mortadela Maddalena va a Nueva York a reunirse con su prometido Michele, que emigró cuatro años antes. Como Michele estaba casado y en Italia no existía el divorcio, no podían casarse. En el aeropuerto, a Maddalena la retiene la policía aduanera por llevar una mortadela en el equipaje. Su estancia en la terminal le servirá para conocer la verdadera América y al verdadero Michele.

programme.title: Resen - Drama
programme.desc: La escalera de caracol Una joven muda (McGuire) trabaja en una gran mansión como criada de una anciana enferma. Cuando un asesino en serie empieza a aterrorizar al vecindario, la señora se preocupa por la seguridad de su bella sirvienta. De este film de suspense se dijo que Hitchcock no lo hubiera hecho mejor.

programme.title: Resen - Drama
programme.desc: Rebeca Al poco tiempo de perder a su esposa Rebeca, el aristócrata inglés Maxim De Winter conoce en Montecarlo a una joven humilde, dama de compañía de una señora americana. De Winter y la joven se casan y se van a vivir a Inglaterra, a la mansión de Manderley, residencia habitual de Maxim. La nueva señora De Winter se da cuenta muy pronto de que todo allí está impregnado del recuerdo de Rebeca.

programme.title: Resen - Musical
programme.desc: Nina Nina es una joven camarera de un hotel romano de segunda categoría, donde se hospeda de forma permanente una anciana condesa que, en su juventud, gracias a su gran belleza, inteligencia y clase, llegó a ser amante de emperadores, reyes, artistas y escritores. En el mismo hotel reside un excéntrico guionista que se esfuerza por escribir una escena violenta, porque es lo que espera el caprichoso director al que quiere impresionar.

programme.title: Resen - Comedia
programme.desc: Pagina en blanco La situación económica de una pareja de aristócratas ingleses, Victor (Cary Grant) y Hillary (Deborah Kerr), es tan precaria que deciden convertir su castillo en un centro de atracción turística. Charles Delacro (Robert Mitchum), un millonario americano, magnate del petróleo, después de una visita guiada, se encapricha con Hillary. Otra aristócrata, Hattie Durant (Jean Simmons), se verá también involucrada en la vida amorosa de la pareja.

programme.title: Erno - Thriller
programme.desc: Traicion en Atenas 1941, Atenas. El periodista Mike Morrison se encuentra en Atenas con información fundamental sobre participantes en la Segunda Guerra Mundial: desde nazis, colaboracionistas, a, incluso, miembros de la resistencia griega. Dicha información debe llegar a Gran Bretaña para ser utilizada en las estrategias que tienen lugar durante la guerra. Sin embargo, el periodista es perseguido durante la travesía.

programme.title: Resen - Comedia
programme.desc: Pata de palo Un grupo de piratas, comandados por un cojo llamado Patapalo, recorren el Oeste en busca de un tesoro escondido por dos gemelos traicioneros. Para encontrarlo confían en la memoria de un loro borracho, el único que sabe dónde enterraron el tesoro los hermanos. Por el camino, la familia de un terrateniente se unirá a la búsqueda del tesoro.

programme.title: Terror
programme.desc: La Mujer Avispa El doctor Zinthrop asegura que ha encontrado el secreto de la eterna juventud: se trata de un suero hecho con enzimas de avispa. Janice decide probar la pócima, y su piel se torna tersa y lozana. Pero, al agotarse accidentalmente el suero, Janice empieza a sentir los efectos secundarios; por las noches, se transforma en la mujer avispa: un monstruo que mata para obtener la sangre de sus víctimas.

programme.title: Erno - War
programme.desc: Corredor hacia China Cerca del final de la fase francesa de la Guerra de Indochina, un grupo de mercenarios son reclutados para viajar a través del territorio enemigo hasta la frontera con China, donde intentarán destruir un importante depósito de armas.

programme.title: Resen - Drama
programme.desc: Pigmalión Cuando el profesor Higgins, un especialista en fonética, conoce casuamente a Elisa, una vendedora de flores, la vulgaridad e incorrección de su lenguaje despierta extraordinariamente su interés. Decide entonces realizar un experimento con ella: transformar a Elisa hasta convertirla en una respetable dama de la alta sociedad

programme.title: Resen - Aventuras
programme.desc: Los dientes del diablo Inuk (Anthony Quinn) se siente solo en su iglú, pues, no tiene a una mujer que le haga "reír"... pero la vida va a mostrarse generosa con él, y pronto llegarán dos guapas muchachas entre las que tendrá el privilegio de elegir. Las costumbres y los grandes valores de su cultura, van a quedar bellamente recreados

programme.title: Resen - Comedia
programme.desc: Polo de limon Benji, Bobby y Huey son tres muchachos que viven su adolescencia en el Israel de los años 50, y por supuesto la viven obsesionados por una única cosa... el sexo. Benji está enamorado de la guapísima Niki, pero ella prefiere a su amigo Bobby. Tras infructuosos esfuerzos por tener su primera experiencia sexual, deciden un método más inusual para lograrlo.

programme.title: Resen - Drama
programme.desc: Rebeca Al poco tiempo de perder a su esposa Rebeca, el aristócrata inglés Maxim De Winter conoce en Montecarlo a una joven humilde, dama de compañía de una señora americana. De Winter y la joven se casan y se van a vivir a Inglaterra, a la mansión de Manderley, residencia habitual de Maxim. La nueva señora De Winter se da cuenta muy pronto de que todo allí está impregnado del recuerdo de Rebeca.

programme.title: Historia de la Iglesia Católica
programme.desc: El Renacimiento y la Reforma Protestante En el siglo XIV se inicia en Italia un movimiento cultural de gran importancia: El Renacimiento. La Iglesia tambien se involucró en dicho movimiento siendo en numerosos casos mecenas de los grandes artistas de esta época. Pero también fue un periodo en que dentro del seno de laiglesia creció el nepotismo y la corrupción.

programme.title: Resen - Comedia
programme.desc: Suave como el vison Cathy Timberlake (Doris Day), una chica provinciana y chapada a la antigua, vive en Nueva York y su mayor deseo es enamorarse y crear un hogar feliz. Comparte piso con Connie (Autrey Meadows), otra chica en su misma situación. Un día, mientras Cathy acude a una entrevista de trabajo, un coche le salpica el vestido manchándoselo de barro.

programme.title: Resen - Drama
programme.desc: Secreta invasión Durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial, un grupo de criminales son reclutados para una peligrosa misión en Yugoslavia. Bajo las órdenes del Servicio de Inteligencia británico, los cinco criminales tendrán que llevar a cabo una ofensiva suicida contra los nazis, de cuyo éxito, depende su libertad.

programme.title: Little English
programme.desc: Episodio 3 Las canciones, cuentos y juegos que todos hemos escuchado de niños, interpretados por actores y cantantes ingleses profesionales, narrados de forma entretenida y sencilla y con divertidos fondos infantiles animados que harán disfrutar a los mas pequeños.

programme.title: Resen - Ciencia Ficcion
programme.desc: Los siete magnificos del espacio Los sucesivos y reiterados ataques sufridos por los habitantes de un pequeño planeta en una lejana galaxia hacen que contraten a un ejército de mercenarios para que les proteja de los invasores.

programme.title: Resen - Western
programme.desc: Solo ante el peligro Will Kane (Gary Cooper), el sheriff del pequeño pueblo de Hadleyville, acaba de contraer matrimonio con Amy (Grace Kelly). Los recién casados proyectan trasladarse a la ciudad y abrir un pequeño negocio; pero, de repente, empieza a correr por el pueblo la noticia de que Frank Miller (Ian MacDonald), un criminal que Kane había atrapado y llevado ante la justicia, ha salido de la cárcel y llegará al pueblo en el tren del mediodía para vengarse.

programme.title: Resen - Western
programme.desc: la legión invencible Las tribus indias planean unirse para una guerra total contra los blancos. Brittles, un veterano capitán de caballería, recibe la orden de evitar las concentraciones de indios, al tiempo que debe escoltar a la esposa y a la sobrina de su comandante. Además, ha de impedir que un traficante venda una partida de armas a los indios.

programme.title: Resen - Drama
programme.desc: Sospecha Un atractivo vividor coincide en el tren con una joven ingenua que acabará teniendo que pagarle el billete. Más adelante, vuelven a encontrarse en una fiesta y, tras un breve romance, ella decide casarse con él, a pesar de la oposición de su padre. Considerada por todos, incluida su familia, una solterona, está empeñada en demostrarles que alguien la puede amar.

programme.title: Guia audiovisual de primeros auxilios
programme.desc: Reanimación Cardiopulmonar En este capítulo les proporcionamos consejos médicos de prevención de la parada cardio-respiratoria y les enseñamos las técnicas de reanimación cardio-pulmonar (Rcp) aplicables a adultos, niños y lactantes. Además también les mostramos cómo actuar ante una obstrucción de la vía aérea (OVA)

programme.title: Resen - Comedia
programme.desc: Suave como el vison Cathy Timberlake (Doris Day), una chica provinciana y chapada a la antigua, vive en Nueva York y su mayor deseo es enamorarse y crear un hogar feliz. Comparte piso con Connie (Autrey Meadows), otra chica en su misma situación. Un día, mientras Cathy acude a una entrevista de trabajo, un coche le salpica el vestido manchándoselo de barro.

programme.title: Guia audiovisual de primeros auxilios
programme.desc: Urgencias médicas Existen una gran variedad de urgencias médicas con las que podremos encontrarnos: heridas, contusiones, quemaduras, enfermedades cardio-vasculares, respiratorias, urgencias neurológicas, de alteración de la termo-regulación, etc... En este capítulo vamos a mostrar qué medidas debemos adoptar ante estas urgencias y nuestro comportamiento para ayudar al accidentado.

programme.title: Kinonation - Documentary
programme.desc: Ethiopia by Tuk Tuk 3 Tuk Tuks, 3 Teams, 11 travelers, 18 days of Adventure, more than 2500 kms across southern Ethiopia to discover the ethnic groups of the Omo valley. The crazy mission? Be the first in the history to reach the Omo River on board of three-wheeler.

programme.title: Kinonation - Documentary
programme.desc: Mambo! Poa! During August 2019, 8 students and workers between 19 and 21 years old participated in a missionary experience in Tanzania. They discovered that the journey is not only physical but above all emotional and mental.

programme.title: Kinonation - Documentary
programme.desc: Ciao Aracà This observational documentary records the confrontation with change, loss and hope experienced by the inhabitants of a small hamlet in the idyllic Ligurian countryside faced with rural depopulation, globalisation and industrialisation.

programme.title: Kinonation - Documentary
programme.desc: Spes Contra Spem, Freedom Inside From the Movie Festival of Venice 2016 a journey within the lost souls of some of the ruthless italiani mafiosi of all time sentenced to life without parole.

programme.title: Kinonation - Documentary
programme.desc: Kalavrìa - the Calabrian Greeks land Did you know Greeks are still in Calabria? We are talking about a small group of villages where peaple are still retaining the Greek language in order not to lose the cultural roots that still make their world today, after 2700 years, a world of culture.

programme.title: Kinonation - Documentary
programme.desc: Le Storie di via Carnia It is the story of a suburban street, "via Carnia", told by the inhabitants themselves, with personal memories and vintage photos, and a comparison between past and present personified in two children, who in play and dialogue.

programme.title: Kinonation - Documentary
programme.desc: Giorgia's Alive One day, a 17-year-old girl decides to take half a pill of ecstasy that in a few hours devastates her liver, as well as her life.

programme.title: Kinonation - Drama
programme.desc: Non Scordarti: A Place of Our Own Summer of 2012. In a small country town recently struck by a huge earthquake, young Clara tries to preserve a place that has been important during her growth.

programme.title: Kinonation - Drama
programme.desc: White Calm An existential drama from Lorenzo Bechi, “White Calm” is a story about a young man’s struggles with himself and his own past.

programme.title: Kinonation - Drama
programme.desc: Graffiti - the Story of a Tagging Crew A coming of age tale of a group of graffiti artists that have a run in with the police and a rival gang on the streets of Italy. Through it all they overcome their differences and learn about life, love, and the laws of the street.

programme.title: Kinonation - Documentary
programme.desc: Open Face An exclusive document shot during the first wave of the Pandemic in April 2020 in which the language of the most merciless news meets the poetic narrative of the protagonists: healthcare professionals and entrepreneurs.

programme.title: Kinonation - Comedy
programme.desc: Halibut A basset hound, a shark and a monkey explore their inner thoughts in this surrealist masterpiece from madcap director Lorenzo Bechi.

programme.title: Kinonation - Documentary
programme.desc: Home Movie Surrealist director Lorenzo Bechi turns his camera on himself in this compelling, introspective look at the filmmaking process as he struggles to find a film – any film – to shoot.

programme.title: Kinonation - Crime
programme.desc: A Better Life Rome: Andrea Casadei is a young investigator specializing in audio interceptions. Is often encountered in Piazza Navona with his friend Gigi, street artist frustrated and obsessed with success at all costs, with whom he shares a passion for interceptions.

programme.title: Kinonation - Drama
programme.desc: Reality News Nine actors are taken hostage during a tour in countries striven by war. The kidnap has a political motive and soon turns into a reality show without the hostages' knowledge.

programme.title: Kinonation - Documentary
programme.desc: General Mori - Italy with Its Head Held High The Italian history of the last fifty years told by a man who lived it as a protagonist. The extraordinary story of a man at the forefront of the fight against terrorism and Mafia.

programme.title: Kinonation - Drama
programme.desc: L'equilibrista con la stella A little girl enters a vintage shop to buy a necklace. When she notices a necklace with the Star of David, the old man of the shop tells her the story of the circus that saved her jew mother from the Shoah.

programme.title: Kinonation - Thriller
programme.desc: Aberrante A man inside a room is talking to someone we cannot see. Ivan, that's his name, is reciting a tremendous monologue that goes back to childhood memories and to his mother, who died in the bathroom. But who is he talking to? Who is that unknown person?
